channel.title: Quote of the Day
channel.description: 365 mindset and motivation quotes from real people

item.title: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act but a habit.
The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
Waste no more time arguing what a good man should be. Be one.
You have power over your mind, not outside events.
We suffer more often in imagination than in reality.
Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity.
It always seems impossible until it’s done.
The future depends on what you do today.
Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
Fall seven times, stand up eight.
Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
Make each day your masterpiece.
Success is the sum of small efforts repeated day in and day out.
Don’t count the days. Make the days count.
If you’re going through hell, keep going.
Success is not final, failure is not fatal.
The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear.
Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
Energy and persistence conquer all things.
Well done is better than well said.
Great things are done by a series of small things brought together.
Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
You miss 100 percent of the shots you don’t take.
I never dreamed about success. I worked for it.
The harder I work, the luckier I get.
Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
Don’t wish it were easier. Wish you were better.
The only place success comes before work is the dictionary.
If opportunity doesn’t knock, build a door.
The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
If you can dream it, you can do it.
The best revenge is massive success.
Dream big. Start small. Act now.
You do not rise to the level of your goals. You fall to the level of your systems.
Every action you take is a vote for the person you want to become.
Focus on systems, not goals.
What gets measured gets managed.
Efficiency is doing things right. Effectiveness is doing the right things.
Don’t be busy. Be productive.
What we fear doing most is usually what we most need to do.
If it scares you, it might be worth doing.
The cost of being wrong is less than the cost of doing nothing.
Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
Stay hungry. Stay foolish.
Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
Focus is saying no.
Be stubborn on vision, flexible on details.
Speed matters in business.
Your brand is what people say about you when you are not in the room.
When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are against you.
Failure is an option here.
Persistence is very important.
Earn with your mind, not your time.
Play long-term games with long-term people.
Specific knowledge compounds.
Desire is a contract you make with yourself.
Calm is a superpower.
Discipline equals freedom.
Pressure is a privilege.
Success leaves clues.
Clarity is power.
A year from now you may wish you started today.
What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
Knowing is not enough; we must apply.
Do the best you can until you know better. Then do better.
If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom.
The price of greatness is responsibility.
Do one thing every day that scares you.
Success demands singleness of purpose.
Winning is a habit.
Suffer now and live the rest of your life a champion.
Champions keep playing until they get it right.
Discipline is choosing between what you want now and what you want most.
The best time to plant a tree was twenty years ago. The second best time is now.
Consistency beats motivation.
Progress is built daily.
Do the boring work every day.
Small progress compounds.
Discipline builds freedom.
Win the day.
Excellence is not a skill. It is an attitude.
First say to yourself what you would be; then do what you have to do.
Do not explain your philosophy. Embody it.
Man is affected not by events, but by the view he takes of them.
The successful warrior is the average man with laser focus.
Long-term consistency beats short-term intensity.
Without commitment, you’ll never start.
The secret to your success is found in your daily routine.
Small disciplines repeated lead to great achievements.
Do the simple things well.
Work hard in silence. Let success make the noise.
The pain of discipline is less than the pain of regret.
Do something today your future self will thank you for.
Focus is the gateway to all thinking.
What you tolerate becomes your standard.
Finish what you start.
Excellence is doing ordinary things extraordinarily well.
Success is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
What you do every day matters more than what you do once in a while.
Action is the foundational key to all success.
Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; make it hot by striking.
The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
It is not the mountain we conquer, but ourselves.
Success is peace of mind.
You are what you do, not what you say you’ll do.
Progress is impossible without change.
Action expresses priorities.
Excellence is the gradual result of always striving to do better.
Hard work beats talent when talent doesn’t work hard.
You don’t get what you wish for. You get what you work for.
Never confuse movement with action.
Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
Without hustle, talent will only carry you so far.
Ideas are cheap. Execution is everything.
Comfort is the enemy of growth.
Success is created daily.
Small daily improvements lead to massive results.
Long-term consistency beats short-term intensity.
One day or day one. You decide.
Do the work. Everyone else is tired too.
Make discipline your competitive advantage.
Success is never owned. It is rented, and the rent is due every day.
We become what we think about.
Don’t wait. The time will never be just right.
Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
You will never change your life until you change something you do daily.
The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
Success is doing the right things repeatedly.
Momentum favors the disciplined.
Do not drift. Decide.
Habits decide the future.
What you repeat, you reinforce.
Discipline is remembering what you want.
Master the art of showing up.
Repetition creates mastery.
Success is found in the daily grind.
Clarity comes from action.
Show up daily.
Success compounds.
Finish strong.
Discipline turns goals into reality.
Focus on the step in front of you.
Consistency is what transforms average into excellence.
Success is the product of daily habits.
Make progress, not excuses.
Discipline builds momentum.
What you practice grows stronger.
First say to yourself what you would be; then do what you have to do.
Do not explain your philosophy. Embody it.
He who conquers himself is the mightiest warrior.
The successful warrior is the average man with laser focus.
Without commitment, you’ll never start.
The secret to your success is found in your daily routine.
Small disciplines repeated lead to great achievements.
Do the simple things well.
Work builds confidence.
The pain of discipline is less than the pain of regret.
Do something today your future self will thank you for.
Focus is the gateway to all thinking.
What you tolerate becomes your standard.
Make today count.
Success rewards consistency.
Discipline drives results.
Daily effort compounds.
Build momentum every day.
Progress loves patience.
Work first, motivation follows.
Be consistent, not perfect.
Success is earned daily.
Effort builds identity.
Choose progress today.
Discipline is a form of self-respect.
Focus creates freedom.
Hard things build strong people.
Progress is predictable.
Do the next right thing.
Daily action compounds over time.
Momentum is built, not found.
Consistency creates confidence.
Effort beats excuses.
Make effort automatic.
Reps create results.
One task at a time.
Discipline outlasts motivation.
Focus sharpens results.
Earn your confidence.
Habits shape destiny.
Work quietly. Results make noise.
Build first, polish later.
Execution beats ideas.
Clarity comes from movement.
Be patient but relentless.
Daily discipline pays.
Consistency creates momentum.
Process over outcome.
Show up with intention.
Excellence is not an act, it is a habit.
Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
Happiness depends upon ourselves.
Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished.
At the center of your being you have the answer.
If it is not right, do not do it.
The impediment to action advances action.
Begin the morning by saying, I shall meet busybody, ingrate, arrogant.
He who fears death will never do anything worthy of a living man.
Difficulties strengthen the mind, as labor does the body.
The future belongs to those who prepare for it today.
Do not pray for easy lives. Pray to be stronger men.
In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
Try not to become a man of success, but of value.
The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
Quality means doing it right when no one is looking.
Whether you think you can or you think you can’t, you’re right.
The man who does more than he is paid for will soon be paid for more than he does.
Patience, persistence and perspiration make an unbeatable combination.
Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls.
Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.
The successful person is the one who can build a firm foundation.
You don’t learn to walk by following rules.
Business opportunities are like buses.
If you are not embarrassed by the first version, you shipped too late.
Startups don’t starve. They drown.
Move fast and break things.
Ideas are easy. Implementation is hard.
Great companies are built on great products.
You should take the approach that you’re wrong.
Seek wealth, not money or status.
Learn to sell. Learn to build.
Reading is faster than listening.
The most important skill is knowing how to learn.
Escape competition through authenticity.
Perseverance is failing nineteen times and succeeding the twentieth.
Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
To improve is to change.
We make a living by what we get, but a life by what we give.
Do not go where the path may lead.
What lies behind us and before us are tiny matters.
The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
Nothing great was ever achieved without enthusiasm.
To be yourself in a world that is trying to make you something else is courage.
Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
Far and away the best prize that life offers is the chance to work hard.
Keep your eyes on the stars and your feet on the ground.
Do what you feel in your heart to be right.
No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
What we think, we become.
Peace comes from within.
The mind is everything.
Three things cannot be long hidden: the sun, the moon, and the truth.
Better than a thousand hollow words is one word that brings peace.
The best fighter is never angry.
Silence is a source of great strength.
Mastering others is strength. Mastering yourself is true power.
Knowing others is intelligence; knowing yourself is wisdom.
He who knows he has enough is rich.
Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
Success is never accidental.
Make every detail perfect.
Risk more than others think is safe.
Dreams don’t work unless you do.
The best investment you can make is in yourself.
Risk comes from not knowing what you’re doing.
Honesty is a very expensive gift.
Chains of habit are too light to be felt until they are too heavy to be broken.
Someone is sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree long ago.
Learn to think independently.
Spend each day trying to be a little wiser.
Knowing what you don’t know is more useful.
Take a simple idea and take it seriously.
The first rule is preparation.
You have to do your own thinking.
Pain plus reflection equals progress.
Embrace reality and deal with it.
Don’t confuse goals with desires.
Great people are willing to be bad at first.
Success is a lousy teacher.
Your most unhappy customers are your greatest source of learning.
Life is not fair; get used to it.
If you are born poor it’s not your mistake.
We all need people who give us feedback.
Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful people can change the world.
Well done is better than well said.
An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
Either write something worth reading or do something worth writing.
Lost time is never found again.
Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
Experience is simply the name we give our mistakes.
To live is the rarest thing in the world.
Always forgive your enemies.
Nothing succeeds like excess.
Do not take life too seriously.
To avoid criticism, do nothing.
One machine can do the work of fifty men.
Strength grows in the moments when you think you can’t go on.
Every accomplishment starts with the decision to try.
Do the best you can with what you have.
Success is getting what you want.
Happiness is wanting what you get.
Our lives begin to end the day we become silent.
Faith is taking the first step even when you don’t see the staircase.
Do what is right, not what is easy.
Never give up on a dream just because of time.
Success is the progressive realization of a worthy goal.
You don’t have to see the whole staircase.
Luck favors the prepared.
The harder the conflict, the greater the triumph.
To improve is to change.
If you’re going through hell, keep going.
Don’t watch the clock; do what it does.
It is never too late to be what you might have been.
We do not remember days, we remember moments.
Nothing will work unless you do.
Try to learn something about everything.
Success is not in what you have.
The man who has confidence gains the confidence of others.
It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.
Begin anywhere.
You are never too old to set another goal.
Act as if it were impossible to fail.
What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality.
He who has a why can endure almost any how.
Success is the ability to go from failure to failure.
Fortune favors the bold.
What you do speaks so loudly I cannot hear you.
Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
Success is liking yourself.
Where there is no vision, there is no hope.
The mind is everything. What you think you become.
Act without expectation.
Small opportunities are often the beginning of great enterprises.
Work joyfully and peacefully.
Learning never exhausts the mind.
He who learns but does not think is lost.
The future belongs to those who believe.
Nothing great was ever achieved without enthusiasm.
Well begun is half done.
Turn your wounds into wisdom.
Success is preparation meeting opportunity.
The harder you work, the harder it is to surrender.
You cannot escape the responsibility of tomorrow.
Everything you can imagine is real.
Dream big and dare to fail.
The only journey is the one within.
Success is a journey, not a destination.
To live is the rarest thing in the world.
Experience is the teacher of all things.
What we fear doing most is usually what we most need to do.
Act as if what you do makes a difference.
Success is not measured by position.
Great acts are made up of small deeds.
We become what we repeatedly do.
The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
Action cures fear.
Start before you’re ready.
Do the work.
Persistence guarantees that results are inevitable.
Nothing will stop you if you keep moving.
Success comes from consistent effort.
Today is the day.
